extendedInfo.description: (For rooted devices only!) DiskDigger can undelete and recover lost photos and images from your memory card or internal memory (experimental support for videos, too!). Whether you accidentally deleted a photo, or even reformatted your memory card, DiskDigger's powerful data recovery features can find your lost pictures and let you restore them, or send them to an email account.For complete instructions, please see http://diskdigger.org/androidAgain, this app is for rooted devices only! This is also a work-in-progress app (and not nearly as powerful as the original DiskDigger for Windows), so all constructive feedback and requests for features are welcome!

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: My first app to get root access and it worked brilliantly. I rooted my phone today. One hour later I recovered all photos my little brother had deleted. Nice app. I think the app should scan a little faster and that the dev should work on the speed of the app. Also video recovery is not working well. I would like to know how the app works so developers please enlighten me.
reviews.author: Rahul Ahiray

reviews.title: Not even showing the disk!!
reviews.comment: Neither showing the internal memory nor the external..how will this recover my files which got corrupt!! Not a good app. Woulnt like to give a single star
reviews.author: Vivek Sah

reviews.title: Couldn\'t find a thing!
reviews.comment: I loaded this app to my phone because I had deleted an important photograph. The app could not find a memories source to even search.
reviews.author: John Milgram

reviews.title: Cant see my deleted pics
reviews.comment: My phone is rooted I did a scan oni everything. I lost all my photos from a factory reset, tried this app but no luck can you at least tell me what am I doing wrong. The deleted pictures was originally stored on the internal storage
reviews.author: mohd faisal ali

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: Will this recover my pictures that got deleted before I installed this app?

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: A factory reset caused all my photos to be deleted. I tried a bunch of programs including recuva, dr.fone, but this is the only app that worked.

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.comment: Found video that I deleted last year. Some played, some did not. Overall I\'m impressed. Great job. Oh, it found almost every picture I have deleted since I bought this SD card last year. This is a winner!
reviews.author: DJ Avalo

reviews.title: Help!!
reviews.comment: Is rooted bad for you phone? I have the S3 and my brother is saying its bad to do but I truly want my pictures back. PleAse helpp!
reviews.author: Marisa Mercado

reviews.title: Amazing app !!!!!
reviews.comment: Recovered over 100 photos from a reformatted sdcard. No other app could do what this one did. Thank you very much. Would you consider adding a Bluetooth transfer option ?
reviews.author: mark gonzalez

reviews.title: Wizardry
reviews.comment: Not only did i find the pics i had accidentally deleted, but found a whole bunch of other crap the phone had saved. I only wish for the app to have more filter optionssuch as timestamps and a delete option, it would help a ton.
reviews.author: Victor Petrasevicius

reviews.title: Life Saver!
reviews.comment: App worked great on even a formatted internal sd card. If you have root permission, and you read what the description of the app says, then there should be no reason not to give it 5 stars. Great job and thank you dev.
reviews.author: Justin Pyle

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: By far the best recovery for android
reviews.author: Roy Tierney

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I accidently deleted all my photos and was able to easily recover them with this app. Thank you for this wonderful app.
reviews.author: Jason Hughes

reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY MAGICAL (5 STARS)
reviews.comment: This app worked great. It saved all my photo that was deleted by accident. There are many other application and softwares out there BUT almost all require paid license to recover your deleted photo. THIS IS COMPLETELY FREE AND ABSOLUTELY AMAZING. A free software i downloaded from the internet took 4 hours to finish scanning through my Galaxy Note 2, and this app only took 10-15minutes.  One tiny problem is that not the entire photo is recovered, some corners or edges get cut away, but at least the photos are recovered.  TO THE DEVELOPERS, THANK YOU VERY VERY VERY MUCH!!!
reviews.author: Alvin Hoe

reviews.title: Wow.  Amazing.
reviews.comment: Although recovered only half,  im still grateful that it really works!  Make sure you have a rooted device!  :)
reviews.author: Enoch Ko

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Did it\'s job and restored my pictures.
reviews.author: Mario Krizmanic

reviews.comment: very nice app that works on nexus 4. too bad i am looking to recover audio files in the format of .wav, which is not supported. thank you for the great work, please add more supported file types in future.
